metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4180 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In macOS High Sierra before 10.13.5, an issue existed in CUPS. This issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4180` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
cups-bsd - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
cups-client - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
cups-common - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
cups-core-drivers - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
cups-daemon - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
cups-ppdc - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
cups-server-common - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
libcups2 - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
libcupscgi1 - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
libcupsimage2 - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
libcupsmime1 - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
libcupsppdc1 - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.2-0ubuntu1.10').
